column1: 10/10 - Great job identifying the business functions that could benefit from scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies. Your explanations were clear and well-reasoned. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job in addressing the specific business functions and explaining the benefits of each methodology. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of kanban for certain functions, but could be more specific and clear in your reasoning. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Great job identifying the production and distribution functions as benefiting from Kanban methodology and providing possible columns for the Kanban board. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job in providing specific examples of possible columns in the kanban board and explaining why scrum/sprint is not the best fit for certain functions. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of scrum/sprint for certain functions, but could be more specific and clear in your reasoning. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying the overconfidence bias and providing suggestions on how to avoid it. Keep up the good work!

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition.

Comment: Your definition of overconfidence bias is somewhat vague. Please provide a clearer and more concise definition to better convey the concept.
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job in providing detailed explanations and examples for both scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job! You provided clear and detailed descriptions of how scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies could be applied to Mighty Jaxx's business functions. Keep up the good work!
